alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun and southeastern Victoria Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wood Hi to Point Comfort to near Palacios. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Port Oconnor, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Dacosta, Indianola, Wood Hi, Bloomington, Magnolia Beach, Long Mott, Olivia, Placedo, Green Lake, Inez and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 590 and 598. US Highway 87 between mile markers 816 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
